summary: THE ENGINE STALLS WHEN APPROACHING A STOP DESPITE BEING IN NEUTRAL.  THE STALL IS GENTLE (NOT SUDDEN).  EACH TIME, THE COOLANT AND OIL TEMPERATURE WERE AT REGULAR OPERATING TEMPERATURES (WARMED UP, NOT COLD).  THIS HAS HAPPENED 3 TIMES THUS FAR, AT APPROXIMATELY 30 MILES, 120 MILES, AND 500 MILES ON THE ODOMETER.  THIS CAR IS WITH THE MANUAL TRANSMISSION.
